name: Another Space Shooter
description:
Submission for "GAMES MADE QUICK??? 1½". I just picked up PICO-8 and thought this game-jam was a cool opportunity to make something small and test out this fantasy console.

Now patched to include sound, on-screen-instructions and a better camera.

Should you want to take a look inside the PICO-8 cartridge / source, the .p8.png-file is attached.

Thanks a lot for playing!
